We help you

We build Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence products in a variety of industries. We create customized solutions in tandem with our clients' domain expertise.

Contact us Learn More
OUR services

Welcome to your custom-built AI solution

SUPPLY CHAIN

Forecast demand. Optimize routing. Prevent accidents.

Learn more

PAPERWORK AUTOMATION

Analyze engineering designs. Ensure certification guidelines. Classify and sort incoming documents.

Learn more

BID WIN/ LOSE PREDICTION

Predict optimal bid price. predict whether the bid would be sucessfull or not, based on past history.

Learn more

DRILLING/ PERFORATION OPTIMIZATION

Optimize drilling parameters. Minimize NPT and retain safety/ equipment wear low.

Learn more

ENGINEERING DESIGN OPTMIZATION

Lower material costs while retaining required engineering characteristics. Final designs are certifiable via usage of standard formulas and process traceability.

Learn more

SEISMIC/ LOG SECTIONS

Use neural nets to preprocess, de-noise and interpret 3D seismic cubes. Identify zones on logs and interpolate/ extrapolate log sections.

Learn more

EMPLOYEE SAFETY/ SCORING

Using historical data, predict likelihood of a safety incident. Rank employees based on safety or work record.

Learn more

PROCESS AUTOMATION

Automate complex processes. Augment gut-feeling expertise with data-driven decisions.

Learn more

FAILURE/ ANOMALY DETECTION

Detect failure before it happens. Detect anomalous behavior (web traffic, robotics, driving).

Learn more

AI tools are applicable across a wide range of industries and problems

Our iterative workflow

We give you freedom to stay or leave at every step of the way. 

  • 1

    AI prototype

    Narrow down on solutions with most ROI. Build working AI prototypes.

    ~3 months

  • 2

    AI pilot

    Refactor code for deployment. Build user interfaces.

    ~ 2 months

  • 3

    AI deployment

    Deploy your solution on the cloud. Test and go live!

    ~2 months

Deliverables

As a part of every project, we deliver a full code base, well documented and ready-to-use. We also provide a report and a dashboard with main takeaways/ results.

Ladendirekt

View a sample dashboard for the latest client

ladendirekt launched AI-augmented product descriptions in early this year

We provide full code documention and setup guide

Components, plugins, and usage instructions are all thoroughly documented with step-by-step setup instructions.

> $ conda install requirments.yml Everything installed!
> $ conda refit_model_pipeline.py Reading in new data Checking drift in the new data. Tuning the model paramters Model refitting complete
> $ conda model_inference_pipeline.py Reading in new data Running model predictions Saving results. Dashboard acessible at localhost:8501

Not comfortable diving that deep? No worries, we can help you with the model deployment to a cloud service and maintenance! Learn more
